akn:section.akn:heading: Nonadmissibility of noise exposure map and related information as evidence

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 47507. Nonadmissibility of noise exposure map and related information as evidence No part of a noise exposure map or related information described in section 47503 of this title that is submitted to, or prepared by, the Secretary of Transportation and no part of a list of land uses the Secretary identifies as normally compatible with various exposures of individuals to noise may be admitted into evidence or used for any other purpose in a civil action asking for relief for noise resulting from the operation of an airport. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1287.)
